title: The Writer's Almanac - Sunday, August 15, 2021
description: This day in 1969 the three-day concert known as Woodstock began. A beautiful weekend of music and togetherness in a time of societal anger and war.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: This day in 1969 the three-day concert known as Woodstock began. A beautiful weekend of music and togetherness in a time of societal anger and war.
